# USB-Stick

```t
thesis_hp/
├── .gitattributes
├── .gitignore
├── _book/
├── _quarto/
├── _quarto.yml
├── _bibliography
├── _manuscript
├── index.qmd             # Main project page / Abstract
├── README.md
├── references.qmd
├── KNOWN_ISSUES.md
├── cace/                 # CACE setup for corner alaysis, PVT, MonteCarlo.
├── content/              # contains all the .qmd files for documentation
├── Designs/              # Top-level Design Folder
│   ├── 1_schematics/     # (Design subfolder: Circuit schematics)
        ├── otas          # contains .sch files of otas
│   ├── 2_layout/         # (Design subfolder: Physical layout files)
│   └── 3_kpex/           # (Design subfolder: Extracted parasitic netlists)
├── Expose_HP/            
├── figures/              # contains all the figues for documentation
├── layout_scripts/       # Python scripts specific to physical layout generation/checking
├── Literature/           # References or literature review material
├── python_codes/         # Python scripts to plot raw data
├── sizing/               # sizing using pygmid tool and python scripts for sizing
├── simulations/          # Folder for .spice files and .raw outputs
└── postlayout_simulations/   # Post-Layout Simulation results/setup

```
